h: Contract worker dies in accident on way to home from protest
Over dozen school students hurt in Jashpur Road accident
26 injured as bus rams into bridge in Chhattisgarh's Raigarh
sub_h: According to officials, the incident took place after the bus driver allegedly lost control and ended up ramming the vehicle into the parapet wall of the bridge.

h: Two killed in Surajpur Road accident
Youth killed in bike-pickup truck collision
YouTuber, known for 'Dil se bura lagta hai', dies in Road accident
YouTuber Devraj Patel killed in Road accident in Chhattisgarh's Raipur
sub_h: The 22-year-old YouTuber shot to fame through his YouTube channel ‘Dil se bura lagta hai’ and used to speak in Chhattisgarhi dialect.

h: Korba: 2 brothers killed, 1 hurt in Road accident
Six killed as truck hits pickup vehicle in Baloda Bazaar district of Chhattisgarh
sub_h: At least six persons, including a child and woman, were killed in a Road accident that took place in the Baloda Bazaar district of Chhattisgarh. The accident happened when a pickup vehicle carrying over 2 dozen people was hit by a truck leaving six dead, said Baloda Bazaar SSP Deepak Jha.

h: Couple killed, two kids hurt in Raigarh Road accident
Teacher killed in Road accident
10 of family among 11 killed in truck-SUV collision in Balod
Three of family killed, 3 injured in Road accident
11 including 10 members of a family killed in Chhattisgarh road mishap
sub_h: Eleven people, including two children between the ages of one and three, and five women, were killed in a fierce road mishap that occurred in Balod, 80km from the state capital Raipur, on Wednesday night. Ten out of the eleven victims belonged to one family.

h: 35-year-old woman killed in Road accident
One killed, another injured in Road accidents across capital
One killed as trucks collide head-on at NH 30
3 killed in two Road accidents
17 killed in accidents across state during Holi
Couple returning from wedding killed in road crash in Chhattisgarh’s Durg
sub_h: A couple died after their scooter collided head-on with a car on the bridge over Shivnath river in Chhattisgarh’s Durg on Saturday night.

h: Woman killed, husband injured in Road accident
sub_h: A married woman was killed and her husband severely injured after a speeding trailer knocked them down near bhaisma chowk in Korba district on Saturday. The victims, Kenia Bai and Pyare Lal, residents of Nehru Nagar in Batari were returning home after attending a family function according to the police. The trailer smashed the two-wheeler and Kenia Bai came under the wheels of the trailer due to the impact she died on the spot while her husband sustained injuries. The Urga police officials registered a case of hitandrun and also booked a case against the trailer driver who has been absconding. The dead body was sent for the autopsy while the injured husband is admitted in the nearby district hospital. Meanwhile, local gathered near the accident side and staged a demostations to protest the frequent accidents in the area.

h: 3 killed in separate Road accidents in Korba
sub_h: A five-year-old boy and two adults died in two accidents in Chhattisgarh on Monday evening. In the first accident, a speeding trailer driver hit a car, injuring a secl worker and killing him. In the second accident, a father and son died after they were hit by a car.

h: Two killed in Road accidents in Durg
sub_h: Two persons died in two separate Road accidents while one was severely injured at the same place on Sunday morning in Bhilai-3 police station area of Durg district.

h: 2 youth killed as bike hits speeding truck in Durg
sub_h: Two people were killed in a Road accident near Anda Poloce station in Durg on Tuesday night. The victims were returning from an event when their bike got dashed by a speeding truck at a blind turn in Itwari market road. The deceased have been identified as Keval Patel 23 and Parmanand Thakur 25. According to the police, he vehicles collided headon killing both of them on spot. The duo was drunk and was driving at speed. When they suddenly saw the truck coming toward them, their bike got uncontrollable and they got hit by the speeding truck. Besides the victims were not wearing helmets.

h: Six die in separate Road accidents in Chhattisgarh
sub_h: Six people were killed in three separate Road accidents in Gaurela-Pendra-Marwahi Mungeli and Mahasamund districts in the past 24 hours while three others in Chhattisgarh capital were wounded when their car overturned and fell on a divider on Monday.

h: Three of a family killed in Korba Road accident
sub_h: Three members, including a six-year-old girl, died and other two of a family were injured in a Road accident when their motorcycle was hit by a four-wheeler on the Gursia-Jatga road near Salihabhantha in Podi development of Korba district.

h: Chhattisgarh: Businessman killed, 2 friends critical in Road accident
sub_h: A businessman accomapnied by 2 friends including a hight court advocate got severely injured when their car rammed into a parked truck near Sargaon on Monday. The trio was returning to Bilaspur and remained unattended for more than an hour.

h: Frequent accidents at highway junction, Chhattisgarh HC seeks NHAI report
sub_h: The National Highway Authority of India (NHAI) will submit its report on Sendri Junction, the accident-prone junction on the four-lane National Highway between Gharghoda and Kunkuri in Bilaspur, to the Chhattisgarh high court when the court will conduct its next hearing on suo moto public interest litigation on November 17.

h: Two friends killed in Road accident
sub_h: In a tragic incident that took place in Patan of the Durg district, two friends died in a Road accident on Saturday at 9.30 in the night when their speeding bike crashed into a truck.

h: Two youths killed, one severely injured in Road accident
sub_h: Two youths were killed and one person was severely injured in an accident that took place on Tuesday morning on Durg-Rajnandgaon bypass road after the car in which the three youths were travelling lost control, broke the divider, and collided with the truck coming from the opposite

h: Four killed in Road accidents across Chhattisgarh
sub_h: Four persons including two women were dead and several injured in separate Road accidents in Bilaspur and Janjgir Champa district on Tuesday night. Eight women were rushed to CIMS, Bilaspur and among three others, condition of one is stated to be critical.

h: Chhattisgarh: Two girls killed, 20 injured in Road accident
sub_h: The accident took place on Saturday evening at Polmi ghat near Agarpani village under the Kukdur police station limits when the bus with more than 50 brick kiln labourers on-board, was heading to Bilaspur in Chhattisgarh from Sultanpur in Uttar Pradesh, an official said.

h: Raipur: 2 children, woman die in three Road accidents in a day
sub_h: Two children and a woman died while four were severely injured in three separate Road accidents in the Durg district on Wednesday.

h: Chhattisgarh: 18-yr-old killed in Road accident in Jamul
sub_h: An 18-year-old girl was killed and her uncle was severely injured after a tanker collided with a two-wheeler they were riding on, near Jamul in Durg district late on Wednesday evening.

h: One dead, nine severely injured in Road accident
sub_h: A businessman died while nine others were severely injured in a Road accident after a collision between a bus and a car on the way from Raipur to Abhanpur on Friday.

h: Chhattisgarh: Five killed, 17 injured in tractor-truck collision
sub_h: At least five people were killed and 17 others injured after a tractor collided with a truck in Gariaband district of Chhattisgarh on Tuesday evening.

h: 1 student, 6 hurt in Road accident
sub_h: One student was killed and six others were injured in a Road accident in the Balodabazar district. The students were going appear in an exam when their SUV overturned on the Balodabazar-Bhatapara road on Sunday.

h: 14,980 lives lost in Road accidents in 3 years
sub_h: A total of 14,980 people lost their lives and 34,291 persons were injured in Road accidents during the last three years, Chhattisgarh Home Minister Tamradwaj Sahu informed the Vidhan Sabha on Thursday.

h: Chhattisgarh: Five women, minor girl killed, 20 injured in Road accident
sub_h: Six persons - five women and a minor girl - were killed and at least 20 others injured when the pick-up vehicle in which they were returning from a wedding collided head-on with a truck in Chhattisgarh's Raigarh district on Monday, police said.

h: 9,020 people died in Road accidents in two years: Chhattisgarh govt
sub_h: A total of 9,020 people have died in Road accidents in Chhattisgarh in the last two years, the state government informed in the legislative Assembly on Wednesday.

h: Joint squad to identify accident-prone spots in Durg
sub_h: In a bid to reduce Road accidents in Durg district, the district administration recently formed a joint squad compri sing the engineering wing and RTO officials.
